name: pearlescence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of having a surface that seems to shine with different colours: This stunning stone has the pearlescence of pearl. It is used to impart opacity, thickening, and pearlescence to cream shampoos.
More examplesFewer examplesThe use of thickening agents tends to decrease the pearlescence of the enamels.Pearlescent pigments are known as "effect" pigments because they have the unique optical property of pearlescence as well as colour.The distinction between pearlescence and iridescence is the nature of the specular light reflected.
